title: Docker镜像安全检查
content:
docker镜像安全的检查

官方工具Docker Scan

Vulnerability scanning for Docker local images | Docker Documentation

install

  1. ubuntu
    apt-get update && apt-get install docker-scan-plugin
  2. centos
    yum install docker-scan-plugin
  3. mac
    Download and install the latest version of Docker Desktop

Prerequisites

  • Docker Desktop
  • sign into Docker Hub
  • login Snky account

Usage

Option Description
–accept-license Accept the license agreement of the third-party scanning provider
–dependency-tree Display the dependency tree of the image along with scan results
–exclude-base Exclude the base image during scanning. This option requires the –file option to be set
-f, –file string Specify the location of the Dockerfile associated with the image. This option displays a detailed scan result
–json Display the result of the scan in JSON format
–login Log into Snyk using an optional token (using the flag –token), or by using a web-based token
–reject-license Reject the license agreement of the third-party scanning provider
–severity string Only report vulnerabilities of provided level or higher (low, medium, high)
–token string Use the authentication token to log into the third-party scanning provider
–version Display the Docker Scan plugin version

示例

  1. 扫描依赖树并保存成JSON文件
    ✘ xfxj01@moses  ~/Downloads/swagger-ui-chrome   master  docker scan --json --dependency-tree pikachu:latest > /Users/xfxj01/Downloads/pikachu.json
     xfxj01@moses  ~/Downloads/PR/deepflow-dashboards   main  docker scan --dependency-tree sspringett/nvdmirror:latest

  2. 扫描Dockerfile文件
    xfxj01@moses  ~/Downloads/PR/deepflow-dashboards   main  docker scan --file Dockerfile dashboard:latest
  3. 扫描镜像
    # 随便从habor下载一个比较新的prod镜像
xfxj01@moses  ~/Downloads/PR/deepflow-dashboards   main  docker pull registry.happycfc.com/prod/accounting:2.0.4.11
# 扫描镜像并保存json文件
xfxj01@moses  ~/Downloads/PR/deepflow-dashboards   main  docker scan --json registry.happycfc.com/prod/accounting:2.0.4.11 > /Users/xfxj01/Downloads/accounting2.
0.4.11.json
    扫描结果：
  • severityWithCritical-critical：393
  • severityWithCritical-high：882
  • severityWithCritical-medium:1040
  • severityWithCritical-low:120
  • packageManager-debian8:2322
  • packageManager-maven:118

Docker SBOM

docker sbom尚处于实验状态，未来版本可能会改变或者被移除。

docker sbom使用[[Syft]]项目扫描图像图层来做到这一点，但将来它可能会从图像本身或其他地方读取SBOM。

usage

  1. 下载插件GitHub - docker/sbom-cli-plugin: Plugin for Docker CLI to support SBOM creation using Syft
  2. 检测项目生成SBOM清单文件
    xfxj01@moses  ~/Downloads/sbom-cli-plugin_0.6.1_darwin_amd64  ./docker-sbom sbom --format cyclonedx-xml registry.happycfc.com/prod/accounting:2.0.4.11 > /Users/xfxj01/Downloads/accounting.xml
  3. 将SBOM文件上传到DT

TODO

  • 对比方案docker scan vs harbor plugins
  • Jenkins后者harbor如何集成能力

Q&A

数据格式问题

![[2022-09-02_周五#关于使用docker-SBOM生成的SBOM问题]]

解决思路

  • syft只扫描镜像文件的运行软件组件依赖，分开不同的流程，将镜像文件的检查与应用程序的检测从Jenkins job 到发送到不同的DT，后者同一个DT的不同项目名称/类型
  • 寻找更好的扫描镜像的方式，如harbor [[容器镜像安全-trivy]]
  • 一步到位的治理镜像安全，使用[[容器镜像构建与分发的技术实践与安全思索#基础镜像-Distroless]]

References

  • Generate the SBOM for Docker images | Docker Documentation
  • Vulnerability scanning for Docker local images | Docker Documentation
  • Site Unreachable
